Text: I'm sorry, but how do I seed???? (yeah, I know that is a really daft question, but I'm REALLY new to this !!!)

you just let your software upload even when you have completed your download..

SEED EVERYBODY!

@jannps

Depending on the BitTorrent Client software that you are using, you may need to configure your seeding ratio.

For example, if you are using Transmission for OSX, then under 'preferences/transfers/management' you have the option to change the seed ratio.

Or under the 'view' menu, if you go to 'show inspector' - then 'options tab' - you have to option here to ''seed forever''

If you are using Azarus, BitTorrent or something similar, then you should be able to find a similar configuration option.

Hope this info. helps

Also important:
Your own torrent file (the one you uploaded to TPB) won't work.  Download the modified file from here, double-click it and point your client to the original files you want to share.
Or you could just download handbreak from versiontracker.....
Sorry! I am new to this stuff. What are seeders and leechers?
if you are using an older version of bitorrent just leave it in the window...newer versions give you the option....should be able to convert to a torrent file w/ your program.
